name: Se Sale De Tranquis
description:
******Play This Game In FullScreen***********

"Se sale de tranquis" is an Spanish expression wich basically means "One drink and we go home".  We start taking control of three friends who were hanging out. The goal of the game is to close all the pubs of the town and recruiting as much people along the way.

Controls:

-Moves with "WASD" and directional arrows

-Interact with buildings with "E" 

Enter to pubs until they close and keep your drunkness low by going to eat.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

This game was made for the GameJamON under the theme "Bares, qué lugares" and was made in 36 hours
